name: Nevermiss
description:
Nevermiss is actually a remake of my old abandoned arcade game. Its quite short right now, but i plan on making regular content updates.

 So what is Nevermiss about? Its a fast-paced top down game filled with slicing and cutting, nice synth music and many many viruses that you have to fight(not like actual viruses, enemies in the game are viruses). You play as an antivirus programm cleaning computers from waves of viruses.

The controls are pretty simple:

  • Left mouse button   to attack
  • Hold Right mouse button  to move towards the mouse.

And before you ask, no there's won't be any keyboard analogue controls for movement and attacking. Gamepads won't be supported too, sadly.
